name: HellStar Squadron
description: Embark on an adventure through space with the ferocious HELLSTAR SQUADRON. Dodge wave after wave of bullets, shoot the demons back to hell, and save the galaxy in this fresh, retro shoot 'em up/bullet hell experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 1.2 GHz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with 256 MB Storage: 154 MB available space
